stats_menuTitle.title: Blocked Tracking Attempts
stats_menuTitle.note: Used as a toggle label in a page customization menu

stats_noActivity.title: Tracking attempts blocked by DuckDuckGo appear here. Keep browsing to see how many we block.
stats_noActivity.note: Placeholder for when we cannot report any blocked trackers yet

stats_noRecent.title: No recent tracking activity
stats_noRecent.note: Placeholder to indicate that nothing was blocked in the last 24 hours

stats_countBlockedSingular.title: 1 tracking attempt blocked
stats_countBlockedSingular.note: The main headline indicating that 1 tracker was blocked

stats_countBlockedPlural.title: {count} tracking attempts blocked
stats_countBlockedPlural.note: The main headline indicating that more than 1 attempt has been blocked. Eg: '2 tracking attempts blocked'

stats_feedCountBlockedSingular.title: 1 attempt blocked by DuckDuckGo in the last 24 hours
stats_feedCountBlockedSingular.note: A summary description of how many tracking attempts where blocked, when only one exists.

stats_feedCountBlockedPeriod.title: in the last 7 days
stats_feedCountBlockedPeriod.note: A summary description of how many tracking attempts where blocked, when only one exists.

stats_feedCountBlockedPlural.title: {count} tracking attempts blocked
stats_feedCountBlockedPlural.note: A summary description of how many tracking attempts where blocked, when there was more than 1. Eg: '1,028 attempts blocked by DuckDuckGo in the last 24 hours'

stats_toggleLabel.title: Show recent activity
stats_toggleLabel.note: The aria-label text for a toggle button that shows the detailed activity feed

stats_hideLabel.title: Hide recent activity
stats_hideLabel.note: The aria-label text for a toggle button that hides the detailed activity feed

stats_otherCompanyName.title: Other
stats_otherCompanyName.note: A placeholder to represent an aggregated count of entries, not present in the rest of the list. For example, 'Other: 200', which would mean 200 entries excluding the ones already shown

stats_otherCount.title: {count} attempts from other networks
stats_otherCount.note: An aggregated count of blocked entries not present in the main list. For example, '200 attempts from other networks'
